name: The Waiting Game (HritikDutta)
description:
Your office PC is really slow. It already takes too long to load your projects. But the computer is filled with junk and bloatware. Every new window slows down the loading process significantly.

Close random pop ups and other distracting windows to load the project as fast as possible.

I made this game inspired from my own office PC. This project is purely an expression of my life and not a well thought out game. However I would appreciate any and all feedback that you might have regarding the game.

Also if you try this, feel free to point out any bugs/issues that you find in the game.
